verses.verse: A song of ascents. Of David. O LORD, my heart[b] is not proud, nor are my eyes raised too high. I do not concern myself with great affairs or with things too sublime for me.
Rather, I have stilled and calmed my soul,[c] hushed it like a weaned child. Like a weaned child held in its motherâ€™s arms, so is my soul within me.
O Israel, put your hope in the LORD both now and forevermore.[d]
